Body:
os.makedirs(os.path.join(tmpdir, 'ResumablePipeline', 'checkpoint', 'di'))
os.makedirs(os.path.join(tmpdir, 'ResumablePipeline', 'checkpoint', 'eo'))
with open(os.path.join(tmpdir, 'ResumablePipeline', 'checkpoint', '{0}.txt'
    .format(SUMMARY_ID)), 'w+') as file:
    file.writelines(['0\n', '1'])
with open(os.path.join(tmpdir, 'ResumablePipeline', 'checkpoint', 'di',
    '0.pickle'), 'wb') as file:
    dump(0, file)
with open(os.path.join(tmpdir, 'ResumablePipeline', 'checkpoint', 'eo',
    '1.pickle'), 'wb') as file:
    dump(0, file)
